ing: 16 ounces sauerkraut, rinsed and squeezed dry
des: "This is a party favorite. Everyone fights over the pan as soon as it comes out of the oven! Serve it with wheat crackers or small pieces of rye bread."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise and dressing.
Spread sauerkraut into a 9x13-inch baking dish.  Layer corned beef, Swiss cheese, and the mayonnaise-dressing mixture on top of the sauerkraut.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
